name: church-member-api
description: API server for Church Member Management

scripts.test-db: node -e "console.log('Testing Supabase connection...'); const { Pool } = require('pg'); require('dotenv').config(); const pool = new Pool({ host: process.env.DB_HOST, port: process.env.DB_PORT, database: process.env.DB_NAME, user: process.env.DB_USER, password: process.env.DB_PASSWORD }); pool.query('SELECT NOW()', (err, res) => { if (err) { console.error('❌ Database connection failed:', err.message); } else { console.log('✅ Database connection successful!', res.rows[0]); } pool.end(); });"
